name: baserow
description: Baserow is an open-source no-code database platform and Airtable alternative that allows users to build rich apps and collaborative databases via a spreadsheet-like interface. Self-hosted or SaaS options available.
features: No-Code Database: Build databases without coding knowledge. Spreadsheet-like interface.
Airtable Alternative: Open-source alternative with similar features. No subscription fees.
Collaborative: Real-time collaboration with team members. Work together.
Rich Apps: Build custom applications from your data. Powerful functionality.
API Access: Programmatic access to your databases. Developer-friendly.
Views & Filters: Multiple ways to view and organize data. Flexible visualization.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your data and databases. Data sovereignty.
SaaS Option: Choose between self-hosted or cloud. Flexible deployment.
